channel.title: [Devo] My client keeps crashing
channel.description:
Hello I downloaded a Devo server and client, but I load up the client and play for about two minutes then the client out of nowhere crashes and puts this in the client folder. [code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e1d76, pid=4560, tid=3608 # # JRE version: 6.0_15-b03 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.1-b02 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d76] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------
Current thread (0x000000002af49800): JavaThread "CompilerThread1" daemon [_thread_in_native, id=3608, stack(0x000000002b760000,0x000000002b860000)]
siginfo: ExceptionCode=0xc0000005, reading address 0x0000000000000000
Registers: EAX=0x000000002be40000, EBX=0x00000000307f9770, ECX=0x000000002be3ffd0, EDX=0x000000002b85c920 ESP=0x000000002b85c4c0, EBP=0x000000003093a6d0, ESI=0x000000002b85c920, EDI=0x000000002be3ffd0 EIP=0x000000006d8e1d76, EFLAGS=0x0000000000010206

item.title: [Devo] My client keeps crashing
item.dc:creator: @glowindagger glowindagger
item.description:
@glowindagger wrote:

can u give me the link to the client?

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] My client keeps crashing
item.dc:creator: @Caffeine Caffeine
item.description:
@Caffeine wrote:

iTanq:

Try downloading Devo 2.7

Where can I find a link? - Found it
Thank you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 12:48:55 pm[/size][hr]I Still have the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] My client keeps crashing
item.dc:creator: @Caffeine Caffeine
item.description:
@Caffeine wrote:

iTanq:

Which Devo version?

Not sure the base didn’t say what version it was.
EDIT: I know it’s a newer version.

Read full topic
